title: Comfortable 2 bedrooms duplex plus family room/office /extra space
posting_body: This comfortable 2 bedrooms duplex plus family room/office /extra bedroom all on one level, 1 garage spot.
The unit has beautiful hardwood floors, high ceilings with crown mouldings, and a wood fireplace with gas starter.
The kitchen stainless steel appliances, plenty of cabinets and granite counter tops.
The stylish bathroom features newer fixtures and finishes.
Huge additional individual basement storage room + garage storage.
A private parking space in the garage included in the price!
Great location: close to Detroit School, Detroit Quo shops & restaurants.
Move in fee 400$ are required to secure apt.
